title.rendered: Staff Spotlight: Mark Rogers, Accounts Senior

content.rendered:
This month we spoke to Mark Rogers, Accounts Senior at The Accountancy Partnership!

Give an overview of the duties, functions and responsibilities of your job.

  • Advising clients in a tax efficient way
  • Preparing accounts
  • Tax returns and VAT returns

What is a typical working day like for you?

The juggling act between completing accounts, responding to clients and completing other work.

What are some of the biggest challenges faced by your clients?

Understanding the accounting needs of their business.

How are you able to use your skills to solve problems for them?

Explaining in a manner which makes complicated subjects easy to understand.

What is your favourite part of the job?

Receiving compliments from a client that I’ve helped.

What do you like most about working for The Accountancy Partnership?

The way they look after all the staff and how there is always someone to help.

What skills do you find most useful to do your job?

The years of knowledge I have built up.

Where’s your favourite place to visit on days off?

The beach.

Tell us your proudest achievement

Having two children and navigating them through their early years.

How would your colleagues describe you?

Quiet and calm.

What are you reading/binge watching at the moment?

I hardly watch TV and haven’t read a book since my exams.

Who do you admire, and why?

My Dad, for always being there and never giving up.

What question would you really like to answer, and what’s the answer?!

What is the only mammal which has a knee? An elephant.

 
Find out more about the services we offer by hitting the live chat button, or get an instant quote online. Interested in joining the team? Check out our recruitment page!
